mean_en: the practice of treating somebody or a particular group in society less fairly than others; the ability to judge what is good, true, etc.; the ability to recognize a difference between one thing and another; a difference that is recognized
sentence: This little duck suffers discrimination because it looks different from others.
sentence_trans: 这只小鸭子因为长相不同于其他的鸭子而受到歧视。
word_etyma: discriminat(e)歧视 + ion名词后缀 → discrimination歧视
